article_text:
Joe Scarborough cut off Donald Trump Donald TrumpSanders laughs off Trump's third-party question Sanders: Clinton showing 'tinge of arrogance' Trump and Sanders whip up debate buzz MORE during a live interview on Tuesday, accusing the GOP presidential candidate of not answering questions.

"All right, Donald," Scarborough, the host of "Morning Joe," interjected as Trump offered a lengthy answer to co-host Mika Brzezinski.

article_metadata.dcterms.description: "You've got to let us ask questions, you can't just talk," says Scarborough.
article_metadata.description: "You've got to let us ask questions, you can't just talk," says Scarborough.

og.title: Scarborough cuts off Trump
